title: The Berenstain Bears and the Blame Game
description: This classic Berenstain Bears story is a perfect way to teach children about taking responsibility for their actions!Come for a visit in Bear Country with this classic First Time BookÂ® from Stan and Jan Berenstain. Papa and Mama have had it with Brother and Sister constantly blaming each other for everything. Will the cubs ever learn to accept responsibility, or will they just keep playing the blame game? Includes over 50 bonus stickers!
author: Stan Berenstain
